text: Ilya (Elya) Zalmanovich Baskin (; ; born 11 August 1950) is a Soviet-American actor of Jewish descent. He is known for his roles in Moscow on Hudson, Air Force One, The Name of the Rose, 2010, October Sky, Spider-Man 2, and in Transformers: Dark of the Moon. == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1950 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:Jewish American actors Category:Latvian Jews Category:Naturalized citizens of the United States Category:Actors from Riga Category:Soviet Jews Category:Soviet movie actors Category:Soviet television actors Category:Latvian movie actors Category:Latvian stage actors Category:Latvian television actors
title: Elya Baskin
